text: This small theatre doubles as an outpost for House [[Phiarlan]]. The Sylvan is run by [[Laenan Shol d'Phiarlan]], an accomplished actor who is particularly fascinated with the [[Greensingers]] and the [[fey]] knack for [[enchantment]] and [[illusion]]. While [[Stillwater]] has never come to the Sylvan, Laenan has convinced a number of Greensinger initiates to perform there.
title: Sylvan (theater)
